name: Jihosoft Android Phone Recovery
short_description:
Jihosoft Android Phone Recovery is the most powerful data recovery software for Android phones and tablets. It is quite efficient to recover deleted or lost data from Android phone internal storage as well as external memory card. With its user-friendly interface, you can recover contacts, messages, call history, photos, videos and notes from Android device with few clicks. This powerful Android Data Recovery enables you to scan, preview and selectively recover want you want freely. 

Key Features of Jihosoft Android Phone Recovery 
1.Work well to recover multiple file types like contacts, SMS messages, call history, photos, videos, and notes from Android phones & tablets. 
2.Recover lost data from Android due to accidentally deletion, formatting, factory settings restore, rooting, OS update error, virus attack, etc. 
3.Support to recover data from popular Android phones and tablets from Samsung, HTC, LG, Sony, Motorola, Google, ZTE, Huawei, and others.
summary: Powerful Data Recovery Software for Android Phones & Tablets
